directions: In a large bowl, mix together shrimp, crabmeat, celery, green onion, green pepper, jalapeno, pimento, lemon juice, mayonnaise, sour cream, salt and pepper.  Cover and let stand for at least three hours in the refrigerator to allow flavors to blend.
ingredients: 1 pound cooked shrimp - peeled and deveined
title: Seafood Salad II
